trans-unit.source: Associate schemas to JSON files in the current project
trans-unit.target: 将架构关联到当前项目中的 JSON 文件

trans-unit.source: A URL to a schema or a relative path to a schema in the current directory
trans-unit.target: 架构的 URL 或当前目录中架构的相对路径

trans-unit.source: An array of file patterns to match against when resolving JSON files to schemas.
trans-unit.target: 将 JSON 文件解析到架构时用于匹配的一组文件模式。

trans-unit.source: A file pattern that can contain '*' to match against when resolving JSON files to schemas.
trans-unit.target: 将 JSON 文件解析到架构时用于匹配的可以包含 "*" 的文件模式。

trans-unit.source: The schema definition for the given URL. The schema only needs to be provided to avoid accesses to the schema URL.
trans-unit.target: 给定 URL 的架构定义。仅当要避免访问架构 URL 时需要提供架构。
启用/禁用默认 JSON 格式化程序(需要重启)

trans-unit.source: Tasks and information about your SQL Server Big Data Cluster
trans-unit.target: 有关 SQL Server 大数据群集的任务和信息
查看 Spark 历史记录
查看 Yarn 历史记录
搜索: 清除搜索服务器结果

trans-unit.source: Should BIT columns be displayed as numbers (1 or 0)? If false, BIT columns will be displayed as 'true' or 'false'
trans-unit.target: 是否应将 BIT 列显示为数字(1 或 0)? 若否，则 BIT 列将显示为 "true" 或 "false"

trans-unit.source: Should data types be formatted as UPPERCASE, lowercase, or none (not formatted)
trans-unit.target: 数据类型应格式化为大写、小写还是无(不格式化)

trans-unit.source: Should keywords be formatted as UPPERCASE, lowercase, or none (not formatted)
trans-unit.target: 关键字应格式化为大写、小写还是无(不格式化)

trans-unit.source: should commas be placed at the beginning of each statement in a list e.g. ', mycolumn2' instead of at the end e.g. 'mycolumn1,'
trans-unit.target: 是否应将逗号置于列表中每个语句的开头(例如 ", mycolumn2")而不是结尾(例如 "mycolumn1,")

trans-unit.source: Should references to objects in a select statements be split into separate lines? E.g. for 'SELECT C1, C2 FROM T1' both C1 and C2 will be on separate lines
trans-unit.target: select 语句中的对象引用是否应分到不同行中? 例如，在 "SELECT C1, C2 FROM T1" 中，C1 和 C2 是否将位于不同行

trans-unit.source: [Optional] Log debug output to the console (View -> Output) and then select appropriate output channel from the dropdown
trans-unit.target: [可选] 将调试输出记录到控制台(“查看”->“输出”)，然后从下拉列表中选择相应的输出通道

trans-unit.source: [Optional] Log level for backend services. Azure Data Studio generates a file name every time it starts and if the file already exists the logs entries are appended to that file. For cleanup of old log files see logRetentionMinutes and logFilesRemovalLimit settings. The default tracingLevel does not log much. Changing verbosity could lead to extensive logging and disk space requirements for the logs. Error includes Critical, Warning includes Error, Information includes Warning and Verbose includes Information
trans-unit.target: [可选] 后端服务的日志级别。Azure Data Studio 在每次启动时都会生成文件名；如果文件已存在，日志条目将追加到该文件。有关旧日志文件的清理，请参阅 logRetentionMinutes 和 logFilesRemovalLimit 设置。默认 tracingLevel 记录的内容很少。更改详细级别可能提升日志的记录和磁盘空间要求。“错误”包含“严重”，“警告”包含“错误”，“信息”包含“警告”，“详细级别”包含“信息”

trans-unit.source: Number of minutes to retain log files for backend services. Default is 1 week.
trans-unit.target: 将后端服务的日志文件保留的时长(分钟数)。默认为 1 周。

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of old files to remove upon startup that have expired mssql.logRetentionMinutes. Files that do not get cleaned up due to this limitation get cleaned up next time Azure Data Studio starts up.
trans-unit.target: 启动时要删除的已超过 mssql.logRetentionMinutes 的旧文件的最大数量。将在下次启动 Azure Data Studio 时清理由于此限制而未清理的文件。

trans-unit.source: [Optional] Do not show unsupported platform warnings
trans-unit.target: [可选] 不显示不受支持的平台警告

trans-unit.source: Name of the SQL Server instance
The name of the initial catalog or database int the data source
trans-unit.target: 数据源中初始目录或数据库的名称

trans-unit.source: Specifies the method of authenticating with SQL Server
trans-unit.target: 指定使用 SQL Server 进行身份验证的方法

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory - Universal with MFA support
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory - 支持 MFA 的通用目录

trans-unit.source: Indicates the user ID to be used when connecting to the data source
trans-unit.target: 指示连接到数据源时使用的用户 ID

trans-unit.source: Indicates the password to be used when connecting to the data source
trans-unit.target: 指示连接到数据源时使用的密码

trans-unit.source: Declares the application workload type when connecting to a server
trans-unit.target: 声明连接到服务器时的应用程序工作负荷类型

trans-unit.source: When true, enables usage of the Asynchronous functionality in the .Net Framework Data Provider
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true，则允许在 .Net Framework 数据提供程序中使用异步功能

trans-unit.source: The length of time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to the server before terminating the attempt and generating an error
trans-unit.target: 在终止尝试并生成错误之前等待连接到服务器的时长(秒)

trans-unit.source: The SQL Server language record name
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 语言记录名称

trans-unit.source: Default column encryption setting for all the commands on the connection
trans-unit.target: 针对连接的所有命令的默认列加密设置

trans-unit.source: When true, SQL Server uses SSL encryption for all data sent between the client and server if the server has a certificate installed
trans-unit.target: 当为 true 时，如果服务器安装了证书，则 SQL Server 对客户端与服务器之间发送的所有数据使用 SSL 加密

trans-unit.source: When false, security-sensitive information, such as the password, is not returned as part of the connection
trans-unit.target: 为 false 时，安全敏感信息(如密码)不作为连接的一部分返回

trans-unit.source: When true (and encrypt=true), SQL Server uses SSL encryption for all data sent between the client and server without validating the server certificate
trans-unit.target: 为 true(且 encrypt=true)时，SQL Server 对客户端与服务器之间发送的所有数据使用 SSL 加密，而无需验证服务器证书
附加的 DB 文件名

trans-unit.source: The name of the primary file, including the full path name, of an attachable database
trans-unit.target: 可附加数据库的主文件的名称(包括完整路径名称)

trans-unit.source: When true, indicates the connection should be from the SQL server context. Available only when running in the SQL Server process
trans-unit.target: 为 true 时，指示连接应来自 SQL Server 上下文。仅在 SQL Server 进程中运行时可用

trans-unit.source: Number of attempts to restore connection
Delay between attempts to restore connection
trans-unit.target: 两次尝试恢复连接之间的延迟

trans-unit.source: The name of the workstation connecting to SQL Server
trans-unit.target: 连接到 SQL Server 的工作站的名称

trans-unit.source: When true, the connection object is drawn from the appropriate pool, or if necessary, is created and added to the appropriate pool
trans-unit.target: 为 true 时，从相应的池中取出连接对象，或根据需要创建连接对象并将其添加到相应的池中

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of connections allowed in the pool
trans-unit.target: 池中允许的最大连接数

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of connections allowed in the pool
trans-unit.target: 池中允许的最小连接数

trans-unit.source: The minimum amount of time (in seconds) for this connection to live in the pool before being destroyed
trans-unit.target: 此连接在销毁前在池中生存的最短时间(秒)

trans-unit.source: Used by SQL Server in Replication
trans-unit.target: 由 SQL Server 在复制中使用

trans-unit.source: The name or network address of the instance of SQL Server that acts as a failover partner
trans-unit.target: 充当故障转移伙伴的 SQL Server 实例的名称或网络地址

trans-unit.source: When true, multiple result sets can be returned and read from one connection
trans-unit.target: 为 true 时，可从一个连接返回和读取多个结果集

trans-unit.source: Size in bytes of the network packets used to communicate with an instance of SQL Server
trans-unit.target: 用于与 SQL Server 实例通信的网络数据包的大小(字节数)

trans-unit.source: Indicates which server type system then provider will expose through the DataReader
trans-unit.target: 指示提供程序将通过 DataReader 公开的服务器类型系统

trans-unit.source: Node Command called without any node passed
trans-unit.target: 调用了节点命令但未传递任何节点

trans-unit.source: Unexpected error occurred while applying changes : {0}
trans-unit.target: 应用更改时发生意外错误: {0}

trans-unit.source: Local file will be uploaded to HDFS.
trans-unit.target: 本地文件将上传到 HDFS。

trans-unit.source: Uploading file from local {0} to HDFS folder: {1}
trans-unit.target: 正在将文件从本地 {0} 上传到 HDFS 文件夹: {1}
已将文件成功上传到群集!
将文件上传到群集失败。{0}

trans-unit.target: 获取应用程序 ID 失败。{0}

trans-unit.source: No SQL Server Big Data Cluster found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到 SQL Server 大数据群集。

trans-unit.source: NOTICE: This file has been truncated at {0} for preview.
trans-unit.target: 注意: 此文件已在 {0} 处截断以供预览。

trans-unit.source: The file has been truncated at {0} for preview.
trans-unit.target: 文件已在 {0} 处截断以供预览。

trans-unit.source: No Spark job batch id is returned from response.{0}[Error] {1}
trans-unit.target: 未从响应中返回 Spark 作业批次 ID。{0}[错误] {1}

trans-unit.source: No log is returned within response.{0}[Error] {1}
trans-unit.target: 未从响应中返回日志。{0}[错误] {1}
正在将文件上传到 HDFS

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete this folder and its contents?
trans-unit.target: 确定要删除此文件夹及其内容吗?

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete this file?

trans-unit.target: 正在保存 HDFS 文件

trans-unit.source: An unexpected error occurred while opening the Manage Access dialog: {0}
trans-unit.target: 打开“管理访问权限”对话框时发生意外错误: {0}

trans-unit.source: Unable to create WebHDFS client due to missing options: ${0}
trans-unit.target: 由于缺少选项，无法创建 WebHDFS 客户端: ${0}

trans-unit.source: {0} component exited unexpectedly. Please restart Azure Data Studio.
trans-unit.target: {0} 个组件意外退出。请重启 Azure Data Studio。

trans-unit.source: This sample code loads the file into a data frame and shows the first 10 results.
trans-unit.target: 此示例代码将文件加载到数据帧中，并显示前 10 个结果。

trans-unit.source: Unable to find the file specified

trans-unit.target: 在“{0}”下以递归方式应用权限更改
正在将权限更改应用于“{0}”。

trans-unit.source: Please select SQL Server with Big Data Cluster.
trans-unit.target: 请选择具有大数据群集的 SQL Server。

trans-unit.source: The selected server does not belong to a SQL Server Big Data Cluster
trans-unit.target: 所选服务器不属于 SQL Server 大数据群集
不允许为 SparkJobSubmissionDialog 添加参数
不允许为 SparkJobSubmissionModel 添加参数
获取应用程序 ID 超时。{0}[日志] {1}

trans-unit.source: Property localFilePath or hdfsFolderPath is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 未指定 localFilePath 或 hdfsFolderPath 属性。

trans-unit.source: The selected local file will be uploaded to HDFS: {0}
trans-unit.target: 所选本地文件将上传到 HDFS: {0}

trans-unit.source: Command line arguments used in your main class, multiple arguments should be split by space.
trans-unit.target: 在主类中使用的命令行参数，多个参数应用空格隔开。

trans-unit.source: Property Job Name is not specified.
Property JAR/py File is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 未指定属性 JAR/py 文件。

trans-unit.source: Property Main Class is not specified.
{0} does not exist in Cluster or exception thrown.
trans-unit.target: 群集中不存在 {0} 或引发了异常。

trans-unit.source: The specified HDFS file does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 HDFS 文件不存在。

trans-unit.source: Error in locating the file due to Error: {0}
trans-unit.target: 由于错误导致查找文件时出错: {0}

trans-unit.source: Jars to be placed in executor working directory. The Jar path needs to be an HDFS Path. Multiple paths should be split by semicolon (;)
trans-unit.target: 要放置在执行程序工作目录中的 Jar。Jar 路径必须是 HDFS 路径。多个路径应用分号(;)隔开

trans-unit.source: Py Files to be placed in executor working directory. The file path needs to be an HDFS Path. Multiple paths should be split by semicolon(;)
trans-unit.target: 要放置在执行程序工作目录中的 Py 文件。文件路径必须是 HDFS 路径。多个路径应按分号(;)隔开

trans-unit.source: Files to be placed in executor working directory. The file path needs to be an HDFS Path. Multiple paths should be split by semicolon(;)
trans-unit.target: 要放置在执行程序工作目录中的文件。文件路径必须是 HDFS 路径。多个路径应按分号(;)隔开

trans-unit.source: Please provide the password to connect to HDFS:
trans-unit.target: 请提供密码以连接到 HDFS:

trans-unit.source: Session for node {0} does not exist
trans-unit.target: 节点 {0} 的会话不存在

trans-unit.source: Cannot delete a connection. Only subfolders and files can be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 无法删除连接。只能删除子文件夹和文件。
